title: Up against it
creator_credit: Cath Cantlon and Henley Beach Mural Collective
brief_description: A documentary on the painting of a large mural on a sea wall at Adelaide’s Henley Beach. Shows the design considerations, research, the process of involving the local council and school students, and the preparation and painting of the wall.
creator_credit_for_label: Cath Cantlon and Henley Beach Mural Collective
